title: shrIsha padmanAbha
sahitya:
shrIsha padmanAbha pAhi dEva dEva mAm jaya jaya


caraNam 1    AgamasAra paramahamsa vihAra bhOgirAja bhOga shayana bhuva mOhana jaya jaya
    caraNam 2    vAraNatApa vihata vAmana rUpa sArasa sanAdivandya sArasa nEtra jaya jaya
    caraNam 3    dIna pAlana manasija janaka cidghana syAnandUrapura nilaya samsAra mOcana jaya jaya
